pageContent.title: Still Not Sure
pageContent.descriptionText: <Introtext style="font-family:Helvetica; font-size:16pt; font-weight:bold; color:#cc0033; margin:10px; padding:0 0 0 5px; background:#e8e8e8; border-bottom:1px solid #333; display:block;">Still Not Sure</Introtext><welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:12pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:normal; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">“Over the past week, I’ve thought more about our conversation and I’ve talked it over with Dr. Cardonza. I understand how being aware of our options for treating dilutional hyponatremia will help me make the best treatment decisions, which in turn may improve patient satisfaction. However, having all these options can present its own difficulties. There is considerable variance in cost among the different treatment options for hyponatremia. As you know, controlling costs is an increasing concern for our department.” </welcomeText>
